channel.title: Dataviz on Discoveries of an AdventureR

item.title: Submission for r/dataisbeautiful Dataviz Battle of February
item.description: This post reports the development process I carried for the DataViz battle of February 2018. The rules can be found in the link. Raw Data This month, the data source is a on a github repo. It contains all same-sex marriage legal status for each states of the USA from 1995 to 2015. Import Data (from github) Found how to do it at Github/Opetchey library(RCurl) library(tidyverse) raw_data <- as_data_frame(read.
